title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 400.16 - Adjustments on pressure compensated counters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 400.16 - Adjustments on pressure compensated counters

State Regulations

Counters found to be registering with an error exceeding
plus or minus one percent shall be adjusted to register accurately with a
tolerance of plus or minus one percent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
400.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
